colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHE YE GUNG KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BGYI BA'I 'BANGS, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG ,@010B DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, DGE BSGOS BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO'O, ,)
